name: King Boxing Fight 3D
description:
King Boxing Fight 3D is full contact combat fighting experience with 3D jaw dropping graphics. Prepare for epic versus fighting action, tap as quickly as possible to perform combos and build your power to pull off special attacks against your opponents.
Features:
- Brutal 3 vs 3 combat with massive roster of fighters
- Engage in fast paced on-the-ring action
- Amazing 3D graphics and realistic motion captured animations
- Enter the PvP battlefield to fight with real players
